DataElement.preferredDefinition: The mean diameter of the flat, circular, slightly raised area that forms around the site of an antigenic challenge to the skin.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SRORRES;SRTEST;SRTESTCD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. In addition to the SDTMIG variable SCORRES, create the SDTMIG variable SRTESTCD from the CDASH variable name and determine the value of SRTEST from SRTESTCD. The CDASH prompt may also contain the SRTEST. Use appropriate CDISC Controlled Terminology for the test and test code.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Each test may be collected using the CDASH variable [TESTCD] ( e.g., WHLMDIAM) or [TESTCD]_SRORRES where TESTCD is the appropriate CT for the SR test code e.g., WHLMDIAM_SRORRES.
